pages.text: $(bold)目标：$()魔精附身$(br2)$(thing)海德林诱惑术$()能引来$(thing)魔精$()并强迫它们附身于邻接生物。该五芒星不会导致永久禁锢，魔灵和被附身的生物都会在短时间内死亡。

pages.title: Uses
pages.text: $(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_endermite)被附身的末影螨$(/l)$()$(li)$(l:rituals/possession/possess_skeleton)被附身的骷髅$(/l)$()$(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_parrot)鹦鹉使魔$(/l)$()$(li)$(l:rituals/summoning/summon_wild_parrot)召唤野生鹦鹉$(/l)$()$(li)$(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_greedy)贪婪使魔$(/l)$()
